speaker: NERISSA
text_entry: ACT III

speaker: NERISSA
text_entry: SCENE I. Venice. A street.

speaker: NERISSA
text_entry: Enter SALANIO and SALARINO

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: Now, what news on the Rialto?

speaker: SALARINO
text_entry: Why, yet it lives there uncheck'd that Antonio hath

speaker: SALARINO
text_entry: a ship of rich lading wrecked on the narrow seas;

speaker: SALARINO
text_entry: the Goodwins, I think they call the place; a very

speaker: SALARINO
text_entry: dangerous flat and fatal, where the carcasses of many

speaker: SALARINO
text_entry: a tall ship lie buried, as they say, if my gossip

speaker: SALARINO
text_entry: Report be an honest woman of her word.

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: I would she were as lying a gossip in that as ever

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: knapped ginger or made her neighbours believe she

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: wept for the death of a third husband. But it is

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: true, without any slips of prolixity or crossing the

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: plain highway of talk, that the good Antonio, the

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: honest Antonio,--O that I had a title good enough

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: to keep his name company!--

speaker: SALARINO
text_entry: Come, the full stop.

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: Ha! what sayest thou? Why, the end is, he hath

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: lost a ship.

speaker: SALARINO
text_entry: I would it might prove the end of his losses.

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: Let me say 'amen' betimes, lest the devil cross my

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: prayer, for here he comes in the likeness of a Jew.

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: Enter SHYLOCK

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: How now, Shylock! what news among the merchants?

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: You know, none so well, none so well as you, of my

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: daughter's flight.

speaker: SALARINO
text_entry: That's certain: I, for my part, knew the tailor

speaker: SALARINO
text_entry: that made the wings she flew withal.

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: And Shylock, for his own part, knew the bird was

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: fledged; and then it is the complexion of them all

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: to leave the dam.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: She is damned for it.

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: That's certain, if the devil may be her judge.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: My own flesh and blood to rebel!

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: Out upon it, old carrion! rebels it at these years?

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: I say, my daughter is my flesh and blood.

speaker: SALARINO
text_entry: There is more difference between thy flesh and hers

speaker: SALARINO
text_entry: than between jet and ivory; more between your bloods

speaker: SALARINO
text_entry: than there is between red wine and rhenish. But

speaker: SALARINO
text_entry: tell us, do you hear whether Antonio have had any

speaker: SALARINO
text_entry: loss at sea or no?

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: There I have another bad match: a bankrupt, a

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: prodigal, who dare scarce show his head on the

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Rialto; a beggar, that was used to come so smug upon

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: the mart; let him look to his bond: he was wont to

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: call me usurer; let him look to his bond: he was

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: wont to lend money for a Christian courtesy; let him

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: look to his bond.

speaker: SALARINO
text_entry: Why, I am sure, if he forfeit, thou wilt not take

speaker: SALARINO
text_entry: his flesh: what's that good for?

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: To bait fish withal: if it will feed nothing else,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: it will feed my revenge. He hath disgraced me, and

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: hindered me half a million; laughed at my losses,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: mocked at my gains, scorned my nation, thwarted my

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: bargains, cooled my friends, heated mine

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: enemies; and what's his reason? I am a Jew. Hath

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: not a Jew eyes? hath not a Jew hands, organs,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: dimensions, senses, affections, passions? fed with

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: the same food, hurt with the same weapons, subject

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: to the same diseases, healed by the same means,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: warmed and cooled by the same winter and summer, as

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: a Christian is? If you prick us, do we not bleed?

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: if you tickle us, do we not laugh? if you poison

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: us, do we not die? and if you wrong us, shall we not

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: revenge? If we are like you in the rest, we will

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: resemble you in that. If a Jew wrong a Christian,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: what is his humility? Revenge. If a Christian

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: wrong a Jew, what should his sufferance be by

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Christian example? Why, revenge. The villany you

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: teach me, I will execute, and it shall go hard but I

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: will better the instruction.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Enter a Servant

speaker: Servant
text_entry: Gentlemen, my master Antonio is at his house and

speaker: Servant
text_entry: desires to speak with you both.

speaker: SALARINO
text_entry: We have been up and down to seek him.

speaker: SALARINO
text_entry: Enter TUBAL

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: Here comes another of the tribe: a third cannot be

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: matched, unless the devil himself turn Jew.

speaker: SALANIO
text_entry: Exeunt SALANIO, SALARINO, and Servant

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: How now, Tubal! what news from Genoa? hast thou

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: found my daughter?

speaker: TUBAL
text_entry: I often came where I did hear of her, but cannot find her.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Why, there, there, there, there! a diamond gone,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: cost me two thousand ducats in Frankfort! The curse

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: never fell upon our nation till now; I never felt it

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: till now: two thousand ducats in that; and other

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: precious, precious jewels. I would my daughter

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: were dead at my foot, and the jewels in her ear!

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: would she were hearsed at my foot, and the ducats in

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: her coffin! No news of them? Why, so: and I know

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: not what's spent in the search: why, thou loss upon

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: loss! the thief gone with so much, and so much to

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: find the thief; and no satisfaction, no revenge:

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: nor no in luck stirring but what lights on my

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: shoulders; no sighs but of my breathing; no tears

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: but of my shedding.

speaker: TUBAL
text_entry: Yes, other men have ill luck too: Antonio, as I

speaker: TUBAL
text_entry: heard in Genoa,--

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: What, what, what? ill luck, ill luck?

speaker: TUBAL
text_entry: Hath an argosy cast away, coming from Tripolis.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: I thank God, I thank God. Is't true, is't true?

speaker: TUBAL
text_entry: I spoke with some of the sailors that escaped the wreck.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: I thank thee, good Tubal: good news, good news!

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: ha, ha! where? in Genoa?

speaker: TUBAL
text_entry: Your daughter spent in Genoa, as I heard, in one

speaker: TUBAL
text_entry: night fourscore ducats.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Thou stickest a dagger in me: I shall never see my

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: gold again: fourscore ducats at a sitting!

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: fourscore ducats!

speaker: TUBAL
text_entry: There came divers of Antonio's creditors in my

speaker: TUBAL
text_entry: company to Venice, that swear he cannot choose but break.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: I am very glad of it: I'll plague him; I'll torture

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: him: I am glad of it.

speaker: TUBAL
text_entry: One of them showed me a ring that he had of your

speaker: TUBAL
text_entry: daughter for a monkey.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Out upon her! Thou torturest me, Tubal: it was my

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: turquoise; I had it of Leah when I was a bachelor:

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: I would not have given it for a wilderness of monkeys.

speaker: TUBAL
text_entry: But Antonio is certainly undone.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Nay, that's true, that's very true. Go, Tubal, fee

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: me an officer; bespeak him a fortnight before. I

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: will have the heart of him, if he forfeit; for, were

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: he out of Venice, I can make what merchandise I

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: will. Go, go, Tubal, and meet me at our synagogue;

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: go, good Tubal; at our synagogue, Tubal.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Exeunt
